name: places/ChIJFx-3xKJZwokRcUoNscW6MNg
formattedAddress: 13 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I had the same problem that many other reviewers have commented on. I prepaid Hayden $175 for a highlight session. He said he was going to purchase the products needed prior to my service so he needed payment upfront. He then said that my $175 PayPal payment never went through so he asked me to send it again via Apple Pay (another $175). $350 later and he canceled our appointment last minute and I've never heard from him again since. These two payments were both considered personal transactions through PayPal and Apple Pay so there was no way of getting the money back. Such a sad situation. He was so talented and charming. I didn't realize that he was a crook until it was too late.

originalText.text:
DO NOT GO HERE and DON’T GIVE YOUR CREDIT CARD. This place is a scam. After I made an appointment online I was charged almost $400. I Texted Hayden, who responded promptly, Apologizing and offering a refund. His text is word for word similar to another yelp reviews text received from Hayden; see paste below. Check out Yelp, he has done this to many people. I still showed up to my appointment, after waiting 30 mins and texting Hayden, I was told he burnt his hand on set during a Tory Burch shoot and that he needed to reschedule. He is elaborate with his lies, he even took a picture of his injured hand. Things seemed a bit fishy so I declined the reschedule, so glad I did. Sounds like he has done this to multiple people and is clearly stealing money from his clients. I have reached out asking about my refund and no response. He is stealing money - don’t trust him.
Text received: Thank you for being patient while I checked on the charges that where on your cards. You will have a refund in 5-7 business days.  Please refrain from disputing the charges or claiming fraud as it can take as long as 90 days to get a refund. I am still looking into why my manager or square made charges to your card. Please let me know when you receive the refund. I am very sorry for any stress this has caused.

originalText.text: I would never leave a google review because who looks at google for anything other than directions.  That's exactly what I was found just now (because I have an appointment later today) and was shocked by this girl Kelly's review.  She must have gone to the wrong place because Hayden is fantastic.  I see him every 3 weeks for a cut and instead of just being give  15 minutes like at even the fanciest of barber shops, he allotted an hour for his men's cuts then same as with his women's.   I've been seeing him for about 2 years now, my wife has been seeing him for about 6 years. And we would both follow him anywhere in the city.

originalText.text: Sadly, Hayden Kings no longer maintains a professional, honest business. He CAN NOT KEEP HIS APPOINTMENTS nor does he maintain his Square-Up account which resulted in HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS OF INCORRECT CHARGES TO MY CREDIT CARD when I had paid in cash. HAYDEN LIED TO ME about crediting my bank account and again to bank investigators. I CAN NOT ENDORSE HAYDEN KINGS AS A DEPENDABLE TALENT NOR AS AN HONEST BUSINESSMAN.

originalText.text: Hayden is amazing he’s so good with color. I like to keep my hair long and he doesn’t cut too much but keeps my ends looking healthy. IDK what’s going on with these reviews. Hayden is epic!
